attributes.action: End the TV liscense fee, once and for all!!
attributes.additional_details: So the BBC have just announced a raise of the to liscense to fee to £150 a year. Why is it people still have to pay to line pockets of the corporation that cover up paedophiles and don't even pay there staff equally based on there gender?! Families are struggling to live week to week and this fee isn't helping! It's outrageous and has gone on for far to long! Please share and sign this petition! Let's get this to parliament and get the to liscense abolished once and for all!!
attributes.background: Why in this day in age does every household that has a tv, computer, laptop smart phones STILL has to pay a considerable amount of money each year to pay the BBC, regardless if you even watch their channels or not!
